issue.title: Add email cloaking on metadata
issue.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

To avoid robots harvesting emails from metadata (contacts info) and inundating inbox with spam, CATALOG should support email cloaking function.

The difficulty is to applied this cloaking on XSL tranformation...

But it would be a great security enhancement in respect to all geodata suppliers.

comments.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

2Bruno
Is it really an EasySDI issue or more an deployment issue that can be solved with metadata XSL configuration ?
If so, I would suggest to reject this issue.

**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

Hi Xavier,

A little bit late but I reject this feature as proposed.
You are right, email cloacking can only be fixed through XSL configuration!

Thanks,
